name: Beginner Friendly Routine
description: A gentle introduction to fitness with low-impact exercises

sets.name: March in Place
sets.description: Lift knees gently, swing arms naturally

sets.name: Wall Push-ups
sets.description: Push-ups against a wall at arms length

sets.name: Chair Squats
sets.description: Sit back into a chair, then stand

sets.name: Standing Knee Raises
sets.description: Lift one knee at a time, hold onto something if needed

sets.name: Wall Plank
sets.description: Hands on wall, body straight, hold

sets.name: Step Touches
sets.description: Step side to side, touch floor with opposite hand

sets.name: Standing Quad Stretch
sets.description: Hold one foot behind you, balance on the other

sets.name: Chest Opener
sets.description: Clasp hands behind back, lift chest

sets.name: Deep Breathing
sets.description: Slow, deep breaths in and out
